text: Vicenç Capdevila Cardona (28 October 1936–21 March 2020) was a Spanish lawyer and politician. He was mayor of Hospitalet de Llobregat from 1973 to 1977. He also was a Deputy of Congress from 1977 to 1979, representing Barcelona and a member of member parliament of Catalonia from 1980 to 1984, representing Barcelona. He died on 21 March 2020 of COVID-19 in Barcelona at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish mayors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Barcelona
title: Vicenç Capdevila
